name: Road Trip USA - Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Jigsaw Puzzles of USA including the Statue of Liberty and other famous streets and buildings. Do puzzle in a new way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Road Trip USA - Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and for kids.

- 5 difficulty settings: Up to 280 pieces!
- Every puzzle is unique: Different piece shapes every time!
- Saves all puzzles in progress, so you can work on several at the same time.
- 1080p HD Graphics.
- Support multiple screen sizes.
